name: Friday Night Funkin' vs Kapi [HTML 5 Online Port]
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' vs Kapi [HTML 5 Online Port]
description:
Friday Night Funkin' vs Kapi is yet another fan-made mod for the music rhythm game Friday Night Funkin'. The mod features two new characters and three new songs. Enjoy!

The downloadable version of the mod, on which this port is based, is available here. All the credit goes to Paper Kitty.

P.S. The port may not work properly on Chrome for Mac OS. Use Safari instead.
